titleStmt.title: Gods new-yeeres gift sent vnto England, or, The summe of the Gospell. The first part contayned in these wordes, God so loued the world ... Iohn 3.16 / written by Samuel Nicholson ...
titleStmt.author: Nicholson, Samuel, fl. 1600-1602.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling in Hosier Lane neere Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
